message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1,000,000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Alice, thank you for the offer, but $1,000,000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Let's see if we can find a common ground.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $1,000,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $950,000. This is a great compromise, and I believe you'll be very happy with the product at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $950,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $850,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe it will allow us to reach an agreement quickly.

I understand that $950,000 is still a stretch for you, Bob, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $850,000. However, I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $900,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I believe you'll be happy with the quality and features you'll get at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with $900,000.  I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $875,000.  This is a fair price that allows us both to walk away feeling like we got a good deal.

I understand that $875,000 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $900,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $885,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I believe you'll be happy with the quality and features you'll get at this price.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still hoping we can find a price that works better for both of us. I'm willing to offer $870,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and it allows us to close this deal quickly.

I understand that $870,000 is still a bit below my target price, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $880,000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product, and I believe you'll be happy with the quality and features you'll get at this price.
